description: Arrinera Automotive was founded in 2008 by Polish brothers ≈Åukasz and Marek Tomkiewicz. Based in Warsaw, Poland, the company is known for creating the Arrinera Hussarya GT, a race-ready supercar first unveiled in January 2016 at Autosport International in Birmingham, UK. The company originally called the project Venocara before renaming it.
